description: Information about the original source and/or owner of this content
title: Source

$eref.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
$eref.title: Has additional properties

___name.description: The organization who originated this content.

___source_type.description: The method used to enter this content. E.g. 'staff', 'wires'

___edit_url.description: A link to edit this content in its source CMS.

___system.description: The software (e.g., CMS) that was used to enter this content.
